tier.item: (12) Laaca tomines nijxij nij n-aaca galee pesos guij-nabaa tio
same money this REL NEU-be twenty pesos IRR-ask uncle
xijteni=a laoo Pascual Peres guij-quij=nij laoo guela-guichija
of=1s from Pascual Peres IRR-pay=3 for NOM-sickness
'This same money, which is twenty pesos, my uncle will demand from Pascual Peres. He (or it)
will pay for [the expenses of ] my illness and for my death.'
